message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'm willing to give you 10%.
Alice, that's not a fair split at all. I'm willing to be more generous than your offer, but I need a much larger share. Let's be reasonable.
Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but your offer is too lopsided. I'm willing to give you 40%, but I need at least 60% to make this worthwhile. Let's be reasonable.
Alice, we're running out of time here.  My offer is more than fair considering the inflation working against me. 55/45 is my final offer.
